attributes.action: keep the House of Lords as an unelected chamber.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need an unelected chamber as it removes the one problem of democracy. In the UK, a big majority in the Commons means that the Government can do as it likes. We need the second chamber to be non-partisan, with its members voting for what they think is best for the country - not what is best for the party - thereby regulating the elected, party-biased Commons.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
